GenAiPlugin.description: Submit requests for special pricing on products. This topic is chosen when users need to request a discount or special rate for specific products.

genAiPluginInstructions.description: If the query is about submitting a special pricing request, use Create Special Pricing Request.
Ensure all required information is collected before submitting the request.

GenAiPlugin.scope: Your job is to only handle the submission of special pricing requests for products. This includes gathering necessary details from users and submitting the request.
